location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Maxim gun & crew firing on range at Basidu.’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This black and white photograph shows a group of men in uniform (most probably crew of the Royal Navy ship HMS Sphinx) aiming rifles, and two men in uniform next to them aiming a Maxim gun, observed by a child and group of four men in Arab costume, and five other men.Inscriptions:On reverse of image, in pen: ‘Maxim gun & crew firing on range at Basidu’.
